page.title: 11Airport transport
page.content: Trains on the Blackpool South Line stop at Squires Gate Station,five minutes walk from the airports entrance. Buses from Lytham St.Annes and Blackpool pass the airport entrance,and the number 12 bus route terminates within the airport.Coaches from all parts drop and pick up passengers at the coachair station. Blackpool is,of course,unique in its tramway system running along the sea front. When an aircraft is coming in for landing the pilot makes a radio contact with the approach controller who is in the control tower.He gives him current direction and strength of surface wind.After the aircraft has landed,it is important that it should leave the runway as quickly as possible.
